definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

definition: environmental sanitation/abbr. to 環衛|环卫[huan2 wei4]
health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)

Ai4 guo2 Wei4 sheng1 Yun4 dong4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界衛生日，我祝願你們大家身心健康。

sentences.english: Progress in health care and education reform.
sentences.chinese: 醫療衛生和教育改革的進展。

sentences.english: We has carried out systematic studies to characterize the condition inside the shoes in terms of hygienics.
sentences.chinese: 我們在鞋內衛生方面完成了系統研究，並註明了條件。

sentences.english: But investment in global health is in the national interest too, " Varmus told The Times.
sentences.chinese: 而且投資全球衛生也是國家利益的一部分。

sentences.english: Cross-sectoral international collaboration key to implementing IHR.
sentences.chinese: 跨部門的國際合作是實施《國際衛生條例》的關鍵。

sentences.english: Two are beyond the direct control of the health sector.
sentences.chinese: 其中的兩個危機在衛生部門的直接控制之外。

sentences.english: Then he presided the building of hospital and the establishing of the hygiene schools.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他主持了醫院建設和衛生學校的建立。

sentences.english: When the utility model is used, shaped sterilized sanitary pad paper is glued on the seat pad of a sitting closet.
sentences.chinese: 使用時將成型的消毒衛生墊紙貼在馬桶的坐墊上面。

sentences.english: Radiological health protection standards for X-ray examinations of child-bearing age women and pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 育齡婦女和孕婦的X線檢查放射衛生防護標準。

sentences.english: Have, if applicable, a smooth non-absorbent ceiling to facilitate cleaning;
sentences.chinese: 天花板應光滑不滲吸水，以便於清潔和衛生。

sentences.english: My husband and I are in healthcare.
sentences.chinese: 我丈夫和我是搞衛生保健的。

sentences.english: This, then, is the unique source of our strength as a health agency.
sentences.chinese: 那麼這就是做爲一個衛生機構我們獨特的力量來源。

sentences.english: Many diseases proceed from negligence of hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 許多疾病源於不講衛生。

sentences.english: The water in bathroom need to be boiled for drinking.
sentences.chinese: 衛生間內的水要燒開後才能飲用。

definition: environmental protection/environmentally friendly/abbr. for 環境保護|环境保护[huan2 jing4 bao3 hu4]
character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)

to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
